Posts.Content: dantay112 wrote: I see that there are a few women have had faslodex as a treatment and I'm wondering what their side effects are.  My onc. suggested this with possiblility with avastin.  I'm not thinking that the avastin is a keen idea looking up some of the info on that.  My other option is looking into clinical trials and I hate being someone's ginny pig!
